detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract BaseToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__6.sol#837-938) has payable functions:
	 - ERC1363.constructor(string,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__6.sol#480-487)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [BaseToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__6.sol#L837-L938) has payable functions:
	 - [ERC1363.constructor(string,string)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__6.sol#L480-L487)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

elements.name: require(bool,string)(mintingFinished == false || cap == initialSupply,BaseToken: if finish minting, cap must be equal to initialSupply)
